message.body: Ever been to AZ? I'm leaving tomorrow for a week.

I have! All over. I lived Scottsdale and flagstaff, plus the whole enchanted red rock area, and Phoenix and tuscon are nice little cities. Gorgeous scenery if u like the desert. The drive on the 10 can be soothi g watching the vista change so dramatically

You're amazing. Seriously.
We have so much to talk about.
What made you move to AZ? And...how long were you there?
